title: Login page not loading
description: The login page remains blank on initial load for some users.

title: Email notifications not being sent
description: Users are not receiving email notifications for updates on their submitted bugs.

title: User profile image upload error
description: Uploading a profile image fails intermittently for some users.

title: Search function returns incorrect results
description: The search feature provides irrelevant results when querying with specific keywords.

title: Memory leak in data processing module
description: The data processing module causes a significant memory leak after extended use.

title: Mobile app crashes on startup
description: The mobile application crashes immediately after launch on some older Android devices.

title: Inconsistent UI rendering in the dashboard
description: Users experience inconsistent UI elements in the dashboard view, particularly in the graphs section.
